parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Difficulty </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows a text hint only when in [[cadetMode]].

The text can contain several lines. \n is used to indicate the end of a line. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hintCadet''' text </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hintCadet]] "Press W to move forward";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[hint]], [[hintC]], [[hintSilent]] [[cadetMode]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>

<dt class="note">[[User:ArmAtec|ArmAtec]]
<dd class="note">hintCadet can be used with formatting like this:
<code>[[hintCadet]] [[format]]["Hello %1", [[player]]]</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
